name: Pink Slip Racers
description:
V1.3 - Added new menu and gameplay music in thanks to our awesome floater Jihwoan! 

V1.2 - Less buggy, all the chairs work now - You can successfully finish a game :) Have fun!!!! If you see a black screen on load, make sure you ready up your players. It's a bug...

V1.1 Can finish a game but the camera and a few chairs are still messed up - working on a fix!!

It's kinda broken right now.

TeamName Jamhammer Games

TeamMembers Robert Bava, John Paul Welsh, Kimberly Fong, Giancarlo Marcelli

Floaters Jihwoan Ahn
